channel.title: Recommendation System on Zelong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Recommendation System on Zelong's Blog

item.title: Google Research: Differentiable Search Index
item.description: This paper from Google Research shows us how a Transformer can be utilized to “remember” the indexing of documents via a seq2seq fashion of training and decoding.

item.title: Evolvement of Recommendation System Algorithms
item.description: This blog covers introduction to common algorithms in recommendation systems including Collaborative Filtering, Factorization Machine, Wide&Deep and DeepFM.
